name: Rock, Paper, Scissors: Ultimate!
description:
Choose which character you want to fight. 

Controls:

  • 'A' = Rock. 
  • 'W' = Paper.
  • 'D' = Scissors.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • At the moment the 'Classic' and 'Ultimate' mode have the same gameplay. This will be updated in the future.
  • V.S mode will come at a later date.
